spell.paladins.arcane_missile.name: Arcane Missile
spell.paladins.arcane_missile.descriptio: Shoots a bolt of energy, causing {damage} arcane spell damage.
spell.paladins.arcane_blast.name: Arcane Blast
spell.paladins.arcane_blast.description: Blasts the target, causing {damage} arcane damage. Grants Arcane Power, stacking up to {effect_amplifier} times.
spell.paladins.arcane_beam.name: Arcane Beam
spell.paladins.arcane_beam.description: Channels a beam of energy, dealing {damage} arcane damage every second. Consumes Arcane Power.
spell.paladins.fireball.name: Fireball
spell.paladins.fireball.description: Launches a ball of fire, causing {damage} fire spell damage.
spell.paladins.fire_breath.name: Fire Breath
spell.paladins.fire_breath.description: Incinerates targets in front, dealing up to {damage} fire spell damage every second.
spell.paladins.fire_meteor.name: Meteor
spell.paladins.fire_meteor.description: Crashes a meteor on the target, causing up to {damage} fire spell damage within {impact_range} blocks.
spell.paladins.frostbolt.name: Frostbolt
spell.paladins.frostbolt.description: Launches a ball of frost, causing {damage} frost spell damage and slowing the target on impact.
spell.paladins.frost_nova.name: Frost Nova
spell.paladins.frost_nova.description: Freezes targets around you for {effect_duration} seconds, causing {damage} frost spell damage and blocking their movement. Frozen targets are vulnerable to frost magic.
spell.paladins.frost_shield.name: Frost Shield
spell.paladins.frost_shield.description: Protects you from attacks, projectiles and fire for {effect_duration} seconds, but also slows down your movement.
advancements.paladins.root.title: Paladins
advancements.paladins.obtain_armor.title: A Paladin Is Never Late
advancements.paladins.obtain_armor.descr: Acquire a full set of Paladin Robes
advancements.paladins.rune_crafter.title: Tears and Lamps
advancements.paladins.rune_crafter.descr: Use the Rune Crafting Altar to get twice as many runes
advancements.paladins.spellbinder.title: Spellbinder
advancements.paladins.spellbinder.descri: Bind a spell to an eligible magical weapon
advancements.paladins.enchant_spell_infi: Obtain Spell Infinity enchantment from the Enchanting Table
advancements.paladins.obtain_wand.title: The Wand Chooses The Paladin
advancements.paladins.fire_mastery.title: Pyromaniac
